nfcjlib.core

Class UltralightC

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfcjlib.core.SimpleSCR
      • nfcjlib.core.UltralightC

  • public class UltralightC
extends SimpleSCR
    Eases the manipulation of MIFARE Ultralight C smart cards.

    TODO: write to OTP (page 3), to lock bits (pages 2 and 40) and manipulate the 16-bit counter. (Can be done w/ a simple update: remove page check at the beginning of the update command.)

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate(byte[] myKey)
        Mutual authentication using 3DES.
        Parameters:
        myKey - shared secret key: K1||K2 (16 bytes)
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • changeSecretKey

        public boolean changeSecretKey(byte[] newKey)

      • setAuth0

        public boolean setAuth0(int page)
        Set the page from which authentication is required. The default is 48, which means no restriction.

        For example, if page is 20 then authentication is required from page 20 until the end of the memory. Whether it is only write restricted or read and write restricted depends on auth1.

        Parameters:
        page - page number from which authentication is required
        Returns:
        true if set successfully

      • setAuth1

        public boolean setAuth1(boolean allowRead)
        Set write or read+write restriction on page range set in auth1.
        Parameters:
        allowRead - true to allow read and prevent write, false to prevent both read and write
        Returns:
        true on success

      • read

        public byte[] read(int page)
        Read a 4-byte page.
        Parameters:
        page - the page number to be read (0<=page<=43)
        Returns:
        a 4-byte array with the page contents in hexadecimal, or null on error

      • update

        public boolean update(int page,
             byte[] data)
        Update a 4-byte user page.
        Parameters:
        page - the number of the page to be updated (4<=page<=39)
        data - a 4-byte array containing the data in hexadecimal
        Returns:
        true on success
